name: Chained Up (Zakkuu, m_rgs, Zelirman)
description:
A two days game jam for a two friends gameplay. Taken hostage in an obscure laboratory, you play in coop as Alpha and Beta, two subjects trying to escape.  Linked through handcuffs, you must face many dangers in order to get out of the lab alive. 

CONTROLS : 

This is a meant to be a 2 player local coop game but can be also played alone, don't worry not everyone has friends.

Player 1, Beta :
WASD or left joystick to move 

Player 2, Alpha :
 ← ↑↓→ or left joystick to aim
Space or south button on gamepad to shoot

THE TEAM : 

Zakku : Game Design, Music, Sound Design

Mélina : Game Design, 3D, Art, UI

Zelirman : Game Design, Level Design

Baptiste : Game Design, Dev
